text: Asclepius (also spelled Aesculapius) was a demigod in Greek mythology. He was the son of Apollo. He was made god of medicine and healing. Ascelpius was the god of medicines and healing and was often associated with Imhotep, the architect of the step pyramid of King Djoser. ==References== * Farnell, Lewis Richard.
